login.title: Login Form Example
login.description: A simple yet powerful login form with client-side validation created using the advanced form builder and Zod.
login.loginFormDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account
login.securityNotice: Secure information - not sent to any server in this example
login.tipDescription: Use the demo credentials to see a successful login, or try different values to see validation and error handling in action.

validation.title: Client-side Validation
validation.description: Real-time form validation using Zod schema to ensure data integrity before submission.

errorHandling.title: Error Handling
errorHandling.description: Comprehensive error handling for both client-side validation and server responses.

typeInference.title: Type Safety
typeInference.description: Full TypeScript support with type inference from the Zod schema for end-to-end type safety.

reusability.title: Reusable Components
reusability.description: Form components are designed to be reusable across your application.

form.passwordDescription: Password must be at least 6 characters

registration.title: Registration Form Example
registration.description: Advanced registration form built with the form builder, featuring password strength meter, field dependencies, and complex validation.
registration.registrationFormDescription: Sign up for a new account to get started
registration.securityNotice: Secure information - not sent to any server in this example
registration.tipDescription: Try entering different values to see the validation system in action, including the password strength indicator.

validation.title: Complex Validation
validation.description: Combination of standard and custom validation with field dependencies.

passwordStrength.title: Password Strength Indicator
passwordStrength.description: Real-time visual indication of password strength to guide the user.

fieldDependencies.title: Field Dependencies
fieldDependencies.description: Checking for matching fields like password and password confirmation.

customErrors.title: Custom Error Messages
customErrors.description: Clear and custom error messages for each type of invalid input.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.passwordStrength: Password must include uppercase, lowercase letters and numbers
errors.termsRequired: You must accept the terms of service

helpers.termsDetail: I agree to the terms of service and privacy policy
helpers.birthDate: Please select your date of birth
helpers.passwordRequirements: At least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase and numbers

form.checkEmail: A verification email has been sent to your address
form.registrationComplete: Registration complete! Check your email to continue the process.
